thread.title: Deal: LG Tone Pro Bluetooth headset can be yours for $24.99 over at Daily Steals (was $69.99)
thread.title_full: Deal: LG Tone Pro Bluetooth headset can be yours for $24.99 over at Daily Steals (was $69.99)

author: Mitja Rutnik
title: Deal: LG Tone Pro Bluetooth headset can be yours for $24.99 over at Daily Steals (was $69.99)
text:
If you’re in the market for a Bluetooth headset, you’re in luck. We have found a great deal on the LG Tone Pro (HBS-770) over at Daily Steals. The retailer is selling it for $24.99, which is $45 off its list price. However, it is worth mentioning that the list price of $69.99 is a bit inflated, as we have seen other retailers sell the device sell for far less.
Additionally, you can save a few extra bucks is you opt for a refurbished model, which will set you back just $20. The LG Tone Pro Bluetooth headset is available in black, blue, white, gold, or pink and comes with a one-year warranty.
See also: Come watch a lovely video about the LG G6’s wallpaper 6 days ago The device connects to your smartphone via Bluetooth, so you can listen to music as well as take calls. You’ll be able to listen to your favorite songs for up to 10.5 hours, or talk to your friends and colleagues for up to 16 hours before the device runs out of juice. Once that happens, you’ll be able to fully charge the headset in around two hours.
If you have been thinking about getting the LG Tone Pro Bluetooth headset, this is the deal for you. To get it, visit the retailer’s website by clicking the button below.
Get the deal
